text.value:
if OBJECT_ID('Integration.Lineage', 'U') is not NULL
    select * from Integration.Lineage
else
    create table Integration.Lineage (
	[LineageKey] int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
	[TableName] sysname COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS NOT NULL,
    [SchemaName] sysname COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS NOT NULL,
	[CutoffTime] datetime2 NOT NULL,
    [WatermarkTime] datetime2 NOT NULL,
	[Was Successful] bit NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK_Integration_Lineage PRIMARY KEY ([LineageKey])
	)
